channel.title: EASTER Unicorn Challenge - Drum & Bass! :Unicorn:
channel.description:
<big> **AUXY FORUM UNICORN CHALLENGE:** DRUM & BASS
Winners are announced [HERE](https://disco.auxy.co/t/easter-unicorn-challenge-drum-bass-unicorn/8892/64) </big>
**CHALLENGE :** Boom. Chk. BoomChk. BoomChk, BoomBoomChk. Drum and bass influences are everywhere - it seeps into different electronic genres, it's backing the toothpaste commercial you heard on TV, it is the soundtrack to pharma commercials. Write a Drum‚Äôn‚ÄôBass track using Auxy!
**RULES :** Use any built-in Auxy samples and/or custom uploaded samples to‚Ä¶ make a Drum‚Äôn‚ÄôBass track using Auxy!1!!!11!.
* Target 160-180bpm. Anything higher is going to be pretty frantic, anything lower is getting more into breakbeat territory. * **PLEASE KEEP THE TRACK UNDER 3 MINUTES!** This is a hard and fast rule. Submissions over 3 minutes will not be accepted. * One submission per person! * Post a link to your :soundcloud: Soundcloud track in this topic.
**GUIDELINES :** _Get inspired!_ A few members here have posted some items on the GENRE thread for Drum and Bass -> [DNB](https://disco.auxy.co/t/genre-drum-bass/8059/19)
Another great body of work are the Moving Shadow releases -> [Moving Shadow - Timecode 01.1](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pMl8CraRBk0) Think about the aesthetic. Most tracks boil down to a nice solid bass, a couple of leads and some VERY selective, crafty drum work. Production is usually sparse!
**DUE :** By the end of Sunday EST time. A countdown will appear closer to the time. Winners will be announced a week later.
**JUDGE:** Our newest janitor & D'n'B lover @iammane will make the hard decisions. He'll choose the three winners plus a shortlist of runner-ups.
**PRIZES :** 1. The mother of you, so proud become, yes? 2. Ability to gloat online. Like a big online gloater. 3. TOP THREE tracks win an exclusive limited-edition Auxy Disco Forum Unicorn. :unicorn: 4. Winners appear in the official Auxy App Feed.

item.title: EASTER Unicorn Challenge - Drum & Bass! :Unicorn:
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
Congrats to the winners. Your unicorns have been caught and allocated. And your name‚Äôs have been added to the Unicorn Hall of Fame. We‚Äôll arrange for your tracks to be posted in the Auxy feed.

Congrats also to the Runner-ups and other entrants for taking on Drum and Bass.

And thanks to ICSleepers for judging.

Auxy Forum - Unicorn Hall of Fame Contest & Challenges

item.description:
To all entrants: ‚ÑÇùïÜ‚Ñïùîæ‚Ñùùî∏ùïãùïåùïÉùî∏ùïãùïÄùïÜ‚Ñïùïä!

I‚Äôve reviewed the submitted tracks, you can find the shortlist here!

https://soundcloud.com/icsleepers/sets/easter-unicorn-challenge

@MisterMaster and myself are still wrangling the 's but don‚Äôt worry, we‚Äôre pretty confident we can catch them and distribute to the winners.

Pitched snare roll please

TOP THREE (in alphabetical order)
@INDIR3CT - Neo ‚Äî> https://soundcloud.com/indir3ct/neo
@anon38751485 - ROUTE 350 ‚Äî> https://soundcloud.com/kayashokayasho/route-350

RUNNER UPS (in alphabetical order)

Again, as soon as we catch those unicorns they will be shipped to you expediently. They will be unharmed in transit

Great job everyone!

item.title: EASTER Unicorn Challenge - Drum & Bass! :Unicorn:
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
I miss the regular challenges too. Beat The Clock will probably return at some point, but not sure when or how often, as that‚Äôs Lenberg‚Äôs call. The gap since the last one is mostly due to the time involved in organising / running them.

The Unicorn challenges (like this thread) are not planned as a super-regular thing. More like 2 or three a year.

The March House Music Challenge has been fun, so will probably do another genre challenge like that one month. My personal preference is for the regular BTC‚Äôs to return.

Let‚Äôs not derail this thread with a discussion about the future of challenges, but if anyone has thoughts on it, you‚Äôre welcome to make a topic in the feedback section.

Read full topic

item.title: EASTER Unicorn Challenge - Drum & Bass! :Unicorn:
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
Came home from camping early as we were sick of having to wade through a foot of water (no joke) to get to our tent. So had a couple of hours to squeeze out this for the challenge: https://soundcloud.com/lowemasterpro/carl

Happy Easter everyone! Sorry I‚Äôve not been around much, work is hellishly busy at the moment. Been working every minute of every day including weekends, so not had any time for Auxy :-/
